price: Burya ukwumva n’ukubona kwabo, bizoba bitangaje koko[379] umusi baje iwacu Twebwe Allah ku musi w’izuka! Ahubwo abirenganije kuri uno musi kw’isi, bari mu muzimagiza ugaragara uri kure y’ukuri.
arabic: أَسۡمِعۡ بِهِمۡ وَأَبۡصِرۡ يَوۡمَ يَأۡتُونَنَا لَٰكِنِ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
footnotes: [379] Ico gihe bazoba bashoboye koko kwumva no kubona; ariko ukwumva n’ukubona, nta co bizobamarira ku musi w’izuka.

meta.transliteration: asmiʿ bihim wa-abṣir yawma yatūnanā lākini al-ẓālimūna al-yawma fī ḍalālin mubīnin
